name: Pineapple Chaos
description:
Pineapple Chaos - A game where you play as a pineapple in a world where pineapple on pizza doesn't exist!

Take over the world and cause chaos by shooting pepperoni enemies!

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys to move

Space/Up arrow to jump

Left mouse button/Z to shoot/melee

Notes:

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2, and the theme was "Let There Be  Chaos".

The scope for this game was way too big. And there were a lot of issues. Therefore, this game probably has a massive amount of bugs and unfinished things. I'm not expecting this to get a high score at all. Oh well. Still, if anyone plays this, thanks!
